beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook in "Minter"

tests.title: should allow users to mint whitelisted Kresko assets backed by collateral
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should allow users to mint whitelisted Kresko assets backed by collateral

tests.title: should allow successive, valid mints of the same Kresko asset
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should allow successive, valid mints of the same Kresko asset

tests.title: should allow users to mint multiple different Kresko assets
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should allow users to mint multiple different Kresko assets

tests.title: should allow users to mint Kresko assets with USD value equal to the minimum debt value
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should allow users to mint Kresko assets with USD value equal to the minimum debt value

tests.title: should allow a trusted address to mint Kresko assets on behalf of another user
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should allow a trusted address to mint Kresko assets on behalf of another user

tests.title: should emit KreskoAssetMinted event
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should emit KreskoAssetMinted event

tests.title: should not allow untrusted account to mint Kresko assets on behalf of another user
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should not allow untrusted account to mint Kresko assets on behalf of another user
tests.code: await (0, _chai.expect)(User1.mintKreskoAsset(user2.address, f.KrAsset.address, (0, _values.toBig)(1))).to.be.revertedWith(`AccessControl: account ${user1.address.toLowerCase()} is missing role 0x46925e0f0cc76e485772167edccb8dc449d43b23b55fc4e756b063f49099e6a0`);

tests.title: should not allow users to mint Kresko assets if the resulting position's USD value is less than the minimum debt value
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should not allow users to mint Kresko assets if the resulting position's USD value is less than the minimum debt value

tests.title: should not allow users to mint non-whitelisted Kresko assets
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should not allow users to mint non-whitelisted Kresko assets
tests.code:
// Attempt to mint a non-deployed, non-whitelisted Kresko asset
await (0, _chai.expect)(User1.mintKreskoAsset(user1.address, "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000002", (0, _values.toBig)(1))).to.be.revertedWithCustomError((0, _errors.CError)(hre), "KRASSET_DOES_NOT_EXIST").withArgs("0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000002");

tests.title: should not allow users to mint Kresko assets over their collateralization ratio limit
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should not allow users to mint Kresko assets over their collateralization ratio limit

tests.title: should not allow the minting of any Kresko asset amount over its maximum limit
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should not allow the minting of any Kresko asset amount over its maximum limit

tests.title: should not allow the minting of kreskoAssets if the market is closed
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint should not allow the minting of kreskoAssets if the market is closed

tests.title: when minted before positive rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt amounts are calculated correctly when minted before positive rebase

tests.title: when minted before negative rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt amounts are calculated correctly when minted before negative rebase

tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt amounts are calculated correctly when minted after positive rebase

tests.title: when minted after negative rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt amounts are calculated correctly when minted after negative rebase

tests.title: when mint is made before positive rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt values are calculated correctly when mint is made before positive rebase

tests.title: when mint is made before negative rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt values are calculated correctly when mint is made before negative rebase

tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt values are calculated correctly when minted after positive rebase

tests.title: when minted after negative rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt values are calculated correctly when minted after negative rebase

suites.title: debt values and amounts are calculated correctly

tests.title: when minted before and after a positive rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt values and amounts are calculated correctly when minted before and after a positive rebase

tests.title: when minted before and after a negative rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #mint - rebase debt values and amounts are calculated correctly when minted before and after a negative rebase

tests.title: should allow users to burn some of their Kresko asset balances
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should allow users to burn some of their Kresko asset balances

tests.title: should allow users to burn their full balance of a Kresko asset
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should allow users to burn their full balance of a Kresko asset

tests.title: should allow trusted address to burn its own Kresko asset balances on behalf of another user
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should allow trusted address to burn its own Kresko asset balances on behalf of another user

tests.title: should allow trusted address to burn the full balance of its Kresko asset on behalf another user
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should allow trusted address to burn the full balance of its Kresko asset on behalf another user

tests.title: should burn up to the minimum debt position amount if the requested burn would result in a position under the minimum debt value
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should burn up to the minimum debt position amount if the requested burn would result in a position under the minimum debt value

tests.title: should emit KreskoAssetBurned event
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should emit KreskoAssetBurned event

tests.title: should allow users to burn Kresko assets without giving token approval to Kresko.sol contract
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should allow users to burn Kresko assets without giving token approval to Kresko.sol contract

tests.title: should not allow users to burn an amount of 0
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should not allow users to burn an amount of 0
tests.code:
const kreskoAssetIndex = 0;
await (0, _chai.expect)(User1.burnKreskoAsset(user1.address, f.KrAsset.address, 0, kreskoAssetIndex)).to.be.revertedWithCustomError((0, _errors.CError)(hre), "ZERO_BURN");

tests.title: should not allow untrusted address to burn any kresko assets on behalf of another user
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should not allow untrusted address to burn any kresko assets on behalf of another user
tests.code:
const kreskoAssetIndex = 0;
await (0, _chai.expect)(User2.burnKreskoAsset(user1.address, f.KrAsset.address, 100, kreskoAssetIndex)).to.be.revertedWith(`AccessControl: account ${user2.address.toLowerCase()} is missing role 0x46925e0f0cc76e485772167edccb8dc449d43b23b55fc4e756b063f49099e6a0`);

tests.title: should not allow users to burn more kresko assets than they hold as debt
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn should not allow users to burn more kresko assets than they hold as debt

tests.title: should charge the protocol open fee with a single collateral asset if the deposit amount is sufficient and emit CloseFeePaid event
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn Protocol open fee should charge the protocol open fee with a single collateral asset if the deposit amount is sufficient and emit CloseFeePaid event

tests.title: should charge the protocol close fee with a single collateral asset if the deposit amount is sufficient and emit CloseFeePaid event
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn Protocol Close Fee should charge the protocol close fee with a single collateral asset if the deposit amount is sufficient and emit CloseFeePaid event

tests.title: should charge correct protocol close fee after a positive rebase
tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn Protocol Close Fee should charge correct protocol close fee after a positive rebase

tests.fullTitle: Minter #mint+burn #burn Protocol Close Fee should charge correct protocol close fee after a negative rebase
